hero.title: Turn Your Restaurant Into a
hero.description: Big chains dominate with technology, not just food. Now you can too.
hero.descriptionFull: OrderChop gives independent restaurants the tech edge with AI-powered ordering, zero-commission online sales, and complete customer data ownership. Everything you need to compete with the big players and dominate your local market.

features.title: Why
features.subtitle: The all-in-one platform that gives you complete control of your restaurant's online presence and profits.

commissionFree.title: Commission-Free Online Ordering
commissionFree.description: Keep 100% of your hard-earned revenue. Never pay 30% to third-party apps again.

seo.title: First-Page Google Ranking
seo.description: Your restaurant's website optimized to dominate local searches.

app.title: Your Own Restaurant App
app.description: Let customers order directly from an app built just for you.

aiPhone.title: AI Phone Ordering
aiPhone.description: Tired of missed calls? Our AI handles phone orders 24/7. English now, Spanish in beta!

crm.title: CRM & Customer Data Ownership
crm.description: Own your customer list. Send promos. Build loyalty. No more relying on third-party platforms.

marketing.title: Automated Marketing
marketing.description: We handle promotions, SMS, email, and telemarketing, so you can focus on food.

choppy.title: Meet Choppy: Your AI-Powered Secret Weapon
choppy.subtitle: Not just another AI tool. It's your
choppy.subtitleHighlight: analytics manager, strategist, and cost-saving genius

analysis.title: Smart Sales Analysis
analysis.description: Analyzes data to craft custom marketing strategies that boost revenue

costCutting.title: Cost-Cutting AI
costCutting.description: Identifies hidden savings and optimizes margins automatically

trends.title: Market Trend Insights
trends.description: Predicts price changes and suggests menu adjustments to maintain profits

automation.title: Decision Automation
automation.description: Implements changes that maximize profits without you lifting a finger

choppy.quote: Choppy handles the analytics so you can focus on what you do best. Delivering exceptional dining experiences.
choppy.cta: Sounds good doesn't it? Let's get started.

testimonials.title: Real Results from Restaurant Owners
testimonials.subtitle: See how restaurants across the country are taking back control and increasing profits with OrderChop.

testimonial1.name: Maria Garcia
testimonial1.text: Since switching to OrderChop, my profits have increased by 32%. We're no longer giving away one-third of our revenue to delivery apps. The AI phone ordering system has been a game-changer for our busy nights.

testimonial2.name: David Chen
testimonial2.text: We've reclaimed our customer relationships and marketing control. The personalized app has helped us build loyalty like never before. Our online orders are up 47% and we're keeping all the profits.

testimonial3.name: James Williams
testimonial3.text: The SEO boost got us to the top of local searches within weeks. We're getting direct orders instead of through expensive platforms. Customer data ownership means we can market directly to our regulars.

testimonials.ctaText: Ready to see these results for your restaurant?

footerCta.title: Let's Make Your Restaurant a
footerCta.subtitle: Join hundreds of restaurant owners who have taken back control of their profits with OrderChop's all-in-one platform.

footer.tagline: The all-in-one solution for restaurant owners to take back control of their profits.
